      • calculateTotalPrice

        public int calculateTotalPrice()
        Calculates the total price of the products inside of the cart. To do so, it sums the price of each product and multiplies it by the product's desired quantity.
        Specified by:
        calculateTotalPrice in interface ShoppingCart
        Returns:
        int price
